text.tspan: Hide the bar at the top, but keep the spacing.
(You could attach an .invisible class to it.)
This is to reduce a jarring jump in hight when
Don't let the progress bar stretch across the entire screen;
set a max-width of around (probably) 60rem in CSS.
This makes it easier to read both the left and right sides.
Certain upgrades on MyHost.lan require a restart to take effect.
For the time being, this step is skipped, as it requires more work to detect changes.
Once tracer support is added, we decide if we want to include this step.
When done, the page turns back to normal and shows the system as being up to date.
